scene_description_enriched: A group of figures are gathered within an architectural setting. At the center, a bearded man wearing a jeweled mitre and ornate robes is the focal point. He is flanked by other men, some with beards and wearing hoods or caps. The architecture consists of blue-painted columns and arches, suggesting an interior space, possibly a church or a grand hall. The figures appear to be engaged in a solemn ceremony or discussion.
